data.news_body:

The presentation that was submitted to the Stock Exchange(s) vide our letter dated 11th February 2026 was presented during the event.

The said presentation is also available on the Website of the Company at the Weblink: M&M Q3F26 Analyst Meet - Presentations deck - 11th February 2026

Further the Company has referred to publicly available documents for discussions and no unpublished price sensitive information has been shared during the aforesaid event.

Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is in continuation of our letter dated 19th January 2026 providing advance intimation of the Analyst / Institutional Investor Meet scheduled and held today i.e. 11th February 2026 at 3:30 p.m. (IST) and our letter dated 11th February 2026 submitting the Presentation for the said meet.

We also wish to inform you that the Company conducted the M&M Q3 FY26 Earnings Conference Call today with several Funds Investors and Analysts in hybrid mode in connection with the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the third quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025 which concluded at 04.45 p.m.

We further inform you that the audio video recording of the said meeting has been uploaded on the Companys website and can be accessed at the following link:

https://www.mahindra.com/investor-relations/reports INVESTOR RELATIONS section under EARNINGS UPDATE Category with link https://youtu.be/1VhLIsvHsZA

Please note that only publicly available documents were referred to during the discussion and that no unpublished price sensitive information was shared during the Earnings Call.

You are requested to kindly take the same on record and treat it as compliance with the applicable provisions of the Listing Regulations.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Meeting Of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited To Be Held On 11Th February 2026 And Closure Of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Mahindra & Mahindra Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 11/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 read with Regulation 50 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we inform you that the Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Wednesday 11th February 2026 to inter alia consider and approve the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter and Nine months ending 31st December 2025.

In terms of the Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading in Securities of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited the Trading Window will be closed from 1st January 2026 to 13th February 2026 (both days inclusive). 

This intimation is also being uploaded on the Companys website at https://www.mahindra.com 

You are requested to kindly note the same.

data.news_body:

The presentation submitted to the Stock Exchange(s) on 20th November 2025 was presented during the event. The said event concluded at 6:30 p.m. 

The said presentation is also available on the Website of the Company at the Weblink: https://www.mahindra.com/sites/default/files/assets/events/Mahindra_Group_Investor_Day_Deck_20th_November_2025.pdf

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is further to our letter dated 12th November 2025 wherein we had given you an advance intimation of the Schedule of Analyst or Institutional Investor Meeting(s) with the Company in terms of Regulation 30(6) read with Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.

We wish to inform you that the Company today i.e. on 18th November 2025 physically participated in (i) Goldman Sachs Annual India CIO Conference - Keynote and (ii) CLSA 28th India Forum 2025 - Keynote in Mumbai with Funds/Investors (Group Meet) and the Presentation(s) which was sent to the Stock Exchanges vide our letter dated 4th November 2025 was shared with them. The aforesaid Conference(s)/Keynote(s) concluded at 09.30 a.m. (IST) and 10.50 a.m. (IST) respectively.

The aforesaid Presentation is also available on the Website of the Company at the Weblink:
M&M Q2F26 Analyst Meet Presentation Deck 4th November 2025.

Please note that the Company has referred to publicly available documents for discussions and no unpublished price sensitive information has been shared during the aforesaid Conference(s)/Keynote(s).

Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is further to our letter dated 12th November 2025 wherein we had given you an advance intimation of the Schedule of Analyst or Institutional Investor Meeting(s) with the Company in terms of Regulation 30(6) read with Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.

We wish to inform you that the Company today i.e. on 17th November 2025 physically participated in CLSA 28th India Forum 2025 in Mumbai with Funds/Investors (Group Meet) and the Presentation(s) which was sent to the Stock Exchanges vide our letter dated 4th November 2025 was shared with them. The aforesaid Conference was concluded at 2.00 p.m. IST.

The aforesaid Presentation is also available on the Website of the Company at the Weblink:
M&M Q2F26 Analyst Meet Presentation Deck 4th November 2025.

Please note that the Company has referred to publicly available documents for discussions and no unpublished price sensitive information has been shared during the aforesaid Conference.

Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is further to our letter(s) dated 13th November 2025 wherein we had given an advance intimation of the Analyst Meeting scheduled to be held today i.e. Thursday 13th November 2025 in terms of Regulation 30(6) read with Para A (15)(a) of  Part A  of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 and Clause 19 of the Industry Standards Note on Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 and also submitted the Presentation proposed to be made at the Analyst Meeting held today.

We wish to inform you that the Company today i.e. 13th November 2025 conducted Analyst Meet with Analysts/Investors in Virtual Mode in Mumbai with respect to the outcome of the recently concluded Board Meeting of the Company.

The Presentation(s) is uploaded on the Companys website and can be accessed at the following Link Mahindra Manulife JV - Presentation Deck - 13th November 2025.

Please note the aforesaid Analyst Meet commenced at 09.00 a.m. (IST) and concluded at 09.33 a.m. (IST).

Please note that the Company has referred to publicly available documents for discussions and no unpublished price sensitive information has been shared during the aforesaid Analyst.

Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is further to our letter dated 13th November 2025 wherein we had given an advance intimation of the M&M Analyst Meeting scheduled to be held today i.e. Thursday 13th November 2025 at 9:00 a.m. (IST) in terms of Regulation 30(6) read with Para A (15) (a) of Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 and Clause 19 of the Industry Standards Note on Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.

We are enclosing a presentation to be made at the M&M Analyst Meet being held today. 

Please note that no unpublished price sensitive information is proposed to be shared by the Company during the aforesaid Meeting.

The Analyst/ Meet is being convened to discuss the outcome of the recently concluded Board Meeting of the Company. Due to the urgency of this matter this Meeting is being scheduled at a shorter notice in accordance with applicable Regulations. Further no one-on-one meetings are proposed either preceding or succeeding the Analyst Meet.

This intimation is also being uploaded on the Companys website at https://www.mahindra.com 

Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Company today conducted M&M Q2 & H1 FY24 Analyst Meet (Earnings Call) with Several Funds/Investors/Analysts in hybrid mode with respect to the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter and Half year ended 30th September, 2023, and the Presentation(s) which were made to them are attached herewith for your records.The same is also being uploaded on the Company's website and can be accessed at the following link: https://mahindra.com/sites/default/files/2023-11/MM-Q2F24-Analyst-Meet-Presentations-deck%E2%80%9310th-Nov-2023_0.pdfFurther, the Audio-Video (AV) Recording of the aforesaid Meet with Several Funds/Investors/ Analysts is available on the Company's website and can be accessed at: https://www.mahindra.com/investor-relations/reports INVESTOR RELATIONS section in the 2023-24 filter under EARNINGS UPDATE nomenclature with link https://www.youtube.com/live/07BFYty2taY?si=38LMY9TiVJ8huThtPlease note the aforesaid Analyst Meet commenced at 4.00 p.m. (IST) and concluded at 5:30 p.m. (IST).Please note that the Company has referred to publicly available documents for discussions at the aforesaid Analyst Meet (Earnings Call).

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited Held On 10Th February, 2023
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on 10th February, 2023 have, approved Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter and Nine months ended 31st December, 2022. This is an intimation under Regulations 30, 33, 51 and 52 read with para A 4. h) of Part A and para A. (16) (b) of Part B of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations).We are enclosing the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter and Nine months ended 31st December, 2022, along with the Limited Review Report thereon, issued by the Statutory Auditors, Messrs B S R & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants and a copy of the Press Release.  .

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: The Company had virtually conducted M&M Q2FY23 Earnings Con-Call with Several Funds/Investors/Analysts on 11th November, 2022 with respect to the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter and Half year ended 30th September, 2022 in Mumbai and the Presentation(s) made thereat along with the weblink of the Presentation(s) and weblink of the Audio Recording of the said Earnings Con-call was submitted vide our letter dated 11th November, 2022.The Transcript of the aforesaid M&M Q2FY23 Earnings Con-call with Several Funds/Investors/ Analysts is enclosed herein and is also available on the Company's website and can be accessed at: https://www.mahindra.com/resources/investor-reports/FY23/Earnings%20Update/TRANSCRIPT-MM-Q2FY23-Earnings-Call-11th-Nov-2022-FINAL.pdf

data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Company today virtually conducted M&M Q2FY23 Earnings con-call with Several Funds/Investors/Analysts with respect to the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter and Half year ended 30th September, 2022 and the Presentation(s) which were made to them are attached herewith for your records.The same is also being uploaded on the Company's website and can be accessed at the following link :               https://www.mahindra.com/resources/investor-reports/FY23/Earnings%20Update/MM-Q2FY23-Earnings-Call-Presentations-deck-11th-November-2022.pdfFurther, the Audio Recording of the aforesaid Earnings con-call with Several Funds/Investors/ Analysts is available on the Company's website and can be accessed at:https://www.mahindra.com/resources/investor-reports/FY23/Earnings%20Update/AUDIO-MM-Q2FY23-Earnings-Call-11th-Nov-2022-final.mp3

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited Held On 11Th November, 2022
data.news_body: Please refer enclosed file

data.caption:
Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The
First Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2022, Along With The Limited Review Report Thereon
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on 5th August, 2022
have, approved Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the First
Quarter ended 30th June, 2022.
This is an intimation under Regulations 30, 33, 51 and 52 read with para A 4. h) of Part A and para A. (16)
(b) of Part B of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations,
2015 (Listing Regulations).
We are enclosing the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the
First Quarter ended 30th June, 2022, along with the Limited Review Report thereon, issued by the Statutory
Auditors, Messrs B S R & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants and a copy of the Press Release;
The Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 10:40 a.m. and concluded at 12:30
p.m.

This intimation is also being uploaded on the Company's website at http://www.mahindra.com

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
The Company has virtually conducted M&M Q2FY22 Earnings Call with Several Funds/Investors
/Analysts on 9th November, 2021 with respect to the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated
Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter and Half Year ended 30th September, 2021,
and the Presentation(s) made thereat along with the weblink of the Presentation(s) and weblink of the
Audio Recording of the said Meet was submitted vide our letter dated 9th November, 2021.
The Transcript of the aforesaid M&M Q2FY22 Earnings Call with Several Funds / Investors/Analysts
is now available on the Company's website and can be accessed at:
https://www.mahindra.com/resources/investor-reports/FY22/Earnings%20Update/TRANSCRIPTMM-
Q2FY22-Earnings-Call-9th-Nov-2021-FINAL.pdf

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited Held On 9Th November, 2021
data.news_body:
We are enclosing the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter
and Half year ended 30th September, 2021, along with the Limited Review Report thereon, issued by the Statutory
Auditors, Messrs B S R & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants and a copy of the Press Release.
Further, in compliance with the provision of Regulation 23(9) of the Listing Regulations, please find enclosed the
disclosure of Related Party Transactions of the Company on a Consolidated Basis for the Half year ended 30th
September, 2021, in the format specified in the relevant accounting standards for Annual Results.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited Held On 9Th November, 2021
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on 9th November, 2021 have
approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter and
Half year ended 30th September, 2021.
This is an intimation under Regulations 30, 33, 51 and 52 read with para A. 4. h) of Part A and para A. (16) (b) of Part
B of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (' Listing
Regulations')
We are enclosing the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter
and Half year ended 30th September, 2021, along with the Limited Review Report thereon, issued by the Statutory
Auditors, Messrs B S R & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants and a copy of the Press Release.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited Held On 6Th August, 2021
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on 6th August, 2021
have approved Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the First
Quarter ended 30th June, 2021.
This is an intimation under Regulations 30 and 33 read with para A 4. h) of Part A of Schedule III of the
SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations).
We are enclosing the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the
First Quarter ended 30th June, 2021, along with the Limited Review Report thereon, issued by the Statutory
Auditors, Messrs B S R & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants and a copy of the Press Release.
The Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 8.30 a.m. and concluded at 11.50 a.m.
This intimation is also being uploaded on the Company's website at http://www.mahindra.com.

May, 2021, with respect to the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the fourth
quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021 and the Presentation(s) made thereat along with the weblink was
submitted vide our letter dated 28th May, 2021.
Further, on 29th May, 2021, the Company had intimated the weblink of the Audio Recording of the said
Annual Analyst Meet.
The Transcript of the aforesaid Annual Analyst Meet with Several Funds / Investors/Analysts is now
available on the Company's website and can be accessed at:

Analyst-Meet-28th-May-2021-FINAL.pdf

data.caption: Outcome Of Meeting Of The Board Of Directors Of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited Held On 28Th May, 2021
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on
28th May, 2021, has approved the following:
1. Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the
fourth quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021;
2. Recommendation of a Dividend of Rs. 8.75 (175 %) per Ordinary (Equity) Share of the
face value of Rs. 5 each.

data.caption: Outcome Of Meeting Of The Board Of Directors Of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited Held On 28Th May, 2021
